description: This team logbook details several varieties of mutagenic experiments, focusing on some bizarre methods of intentionally growing XE037 around bone in order to gain its impact absorption properties that resulted in a malleable material made from...  Blob?

This team logbook details several varieties of mutagenic experiments, focusing on some bizarre experiments that apparently build upon some kind of malleable blob to make it stronger and have other uses.  From the citations, it looks like you'll need a previous work to get started.

This team logbook details several varieties of mutagenic experiments, focusing on some bizarre experiments that capitalize on advancements made on building malleable blob, but you don't think any of it would be useful without the cited works.

name: standpipe maintenance log
description: This binder details the scheduled maintenance for several plumbing systems throughout the facility.  However, some of the log sheets seem to be filled with...  Some interesting experiments that seem to result in altering organic vehicle parts to be permanently cold?
